kubernetes_add_region_info: The selected region is not yet active on your project. This addition takes a few seconds, and does not affect billing.

kubernetes_add_error_InsufficientVCPUsQu: Your project’s vCPU quota is too low to perform the operation. Please increase your quota, or request fewer resources.
kubernetes_add_error_InsufficientRAMQuot: Your project’s RAM quota is too low to perform the operation. Please increase your quota, or request fewer resources.
kubernetes_add_error_InsufficientPortsQu: Your project’s port quota is too low to complete the operation. Please increase your quota, or request fewer resources.
kubernetes_add_error_InsufficientInstanc: Your project’s instance quota is too low to complete the operation. Please increase your quota, or request fewer resources.
kubernetes_add_billing_auto_scaling_mont: Warning: You can enable auto-scaling and monthly billing at the same time for this node pool. Each time you create a node via auto-scaling, you will be billed for one node immediately on a pro rata basis for the remaining time in the current month. We recommend avoiding this combination if you anticipate that your node pool will be reduced frequently.
kubernetes_add_cluster_name_input_patter: The name must start with an alphabetical character, end with an alpha-numeric character, and the only special characters allowed are hyphens and underscores.
kubernetes_add_billing_anti_affinity_com: With the launch of Saving Plans, we will soon be able to bill you monthly.

kube_add_node_pool_error: Unable to create the '{{nodePoolName}}' node pool: {{message}}
kube_add_billing_type_description: All future nodes in this node pool will be billed in this way.
kube_add_billing_type_payment_method: You will be billed via your default payment method.
kube_add_node_pool_error_InsufficientVCP: Your project’s vCPU quota is too low to perform the operation. Please increase your quota, or request fewer resources.
kube_add_node_pool_error_InsufficientRAM: Your project’s RAM quota is too low to perform the operation. Please increase your quota, or request fewer resources.
kube_add_node_pool_error_InsufficientPor: Your project’s port quota is too low to complete the operation. Please increase your quota, or request fewer resources.
kube_add_node_pool_error_InsufficientIns: Your project’s instance quota is too low to complete the operation. Please increase your quota, or request fewer resources.
kube_add_billing_auto_scaling_monthly_wa: Warning: You can enable auto-scaling and monthly billing at the same time for this node pool. Each time you create a node via auto-scaling, you will be billed for one node immediately on a pro rata basis for the remaining time in the current month. We recommend avoiding this combination if you anticipate that your node pool will be reduced frequently.
kube_add_node_pool_name_input_pattern_va: The name must be at least two characters, start with an alphabetical character, end with an alphanumeric character, and the only special characters allowed are dashes and underscores.
kube_add_billing_anti_affinity_coming_so: Monthly billing will be available soon with the arrival of the Saving Plans.
kubernetes_add_version_and_upgrade_polic: Select the minor version of Kubernetes and security policy you want
kube_update_policy_picker_documentation_: Learn more about Managed Kubernetes Service security policies.
kubernetes_add_billing_savings_plan_bann: Take advantage of low monthly rates with Savings Plans—save money without sacrificing the flexibility to use instances whenever you need them.
kubernetes_add_billing_type_description_: You can later switch each of your nodes individually from hourly to monthly billing.
kubernetes_add_deployment_mode_descripti: Select an optimal configuration to ensure the availability, resilience and latency appropriate for your data depending on your use cases.
kubernetes_add_region_description_region: Resilient and cost-effective deployment on 1 availability zone.
High-resilience/high-availability deployment for your critical applications across 3 availability zones.
kube_add_plan_description_standard: Get a free control plan. Only pay for your worker nodes (VMs), with no commitment or guaranteed SLA. Ideal for using Kubernetes at a low cost.
kube_add_plan_content_standard_version: Support for the three most recent versions of Kubernetes
kube_add_plan_description_premium: Optimized for production with a guaranteed SLA. Get a robust platform for your critical applications. Worker nodes (VMs) are still payable.
kube_add_plan_content_premium_3AZ_contro: Fully managed control plane with guaranteed resources
kube_add_plan_content_premium_version: Support for the three most recent versions of Kubernetes
kube_add_plan_content_premium_disponibil: High availability and resilience thanks to an architecture distributed across three availability zones (3-AZ)
kube_add_plan_content_premium_1AZ_banner: The Premium offer is not available in the 1-AZ regions. If you would like to take advantage of the Premium plan, please select the 3-AZ deployment.
kube_add_plan_content_standard_3AZ_banne: The Standard solution is not yet available in the 3-AZ regions. If you would like to take advantage of this offer, please select a 1-AZ deployment.
